file.content:
module "urpc-consume_kafka_slo" {
  source    = "git::https://github.com/doordash/terraform-slos.git//kafka?ref=v4.42.0"
  bucket_id = chronosphere_bucket.nv_catalog_intelligence.id
  service   = "catalog-service"
  namespace = "catalog-service"
  slo       = "catalog-service-kafka-urpc-consume"
  owner     = "eng-nv-catalog-intelligence"
  repo      = "doordash/catalog-service"
  tier      = "1"
  topic     = "catalog_service_cdc_global_product_item"

  # kafka avalability SLO
  enable_availability_slo = true
  availability_objective  = 99.9

  ## Set objectives for latency/availability
  ## temporarily disabled due to high latency from legacy fanout operation
  enable_latency_slo = false

  # Enables 5m/1h/1d/7d alerts with default thresholds and Warning severity
  enable_all_burn_rate_alerts = true

  # kafka consumer lag SLO
  enable_consumer_lag_slo = true
  consumer_lag_objective  = 99.9
  consumer_lag_bucket     = "3600.0" // 1 hr consumer lag


  disable_missing_data_alert = true

  test_mode = false
}


module "prime-content-consume_kafka_slo" {
  source    = "git::https://github.com/doordash/terraform-slos.git//kafka?ref=v4.42.0"
  bucket_id = chronosphere_bucket.nv_catalog_intelligence.id
  service   = "catalog-service"
  namespace = "catalog-service"
  slo       = "catalog-service-kafka-prime-content-consume"
  owner     = "eng-nv-catalog-intelligence"
  repo      = "doordash/catalog-service"
  tier      = "2"
  topic     = "catalog_ml_outputs"

  # kafka avalability SLO
  enable_availability_slo = true
  availability_objective  = 99.0

  ## Set objectives for latency/availability
  enable_latency_slo = true
  latency_objective  = 99.0
  latency_bucket     = "300.0"

  # Enables 5m/1h/1d/7d alerts with default thresholds and Warning severity
  enable_all_burn_rate_alerts = true

  # kafka consumer lag SLO
  enable_consumer_lag_slo = true
  consumer_lag_objective  = 99.0
  consumer_lag_bucket     = "300.0"

  disable_missing_data_alert = true
  test_mode                  = true
}

module "prime-content-consume_failure_count_slo" {
  source    = "git::https://github.com/doordash/terraform-slos.git//slo?ref=v4.42.0"
  bucket    = chronosphere_bucket.nv_catalog_intelligence.id
  service   = "catalog-service"
  namespace = "catalog-service"
  slo       = "catalog-service-kafka-prime-content-consume-failure"
  owner     = "eng-nv-catalog-intelligence"
  repo      = "doordash/catalog-service"
  tier      = "2"
  objective = 99.9

  enable_all_alerts = true
  # Enabled 5m/1h/1d/7d Critical severity alerts with below thresholds
  burn_rate_5m_critical_threshold = 1500
  burn_rate_1h_critical_threshold = 720
  burn_rate_1d_critical_threshold = 200
  burn_rate_7d_critical_threshold = 100

  error_budget_alert_thresholds = [
    {
      severity = "warn"
      percent  = 50
    }
  ]
  test_mode = true

  disable_missing_data_alert = true

  error_ratio_query = <<-EOT
  sum(rate(catalog_service_prime_content_consume_result_count_total{result="failure"}[5m])) or vector(0) / sum(rate(catalog_service_prime_content_consume_result_count_total[5m]))
  EOT
}


module "third_party_data-consume_kafka_slo" {
  source    = "git::https://github.com/doordash/terraform-slos.git//kafka?ref=v4.42.0"
  bucket_id = chronosphere_bucket.nv_catalog_intelligence.id
  service   = "catalog-service"
  namespace = "catalog-service"
  slo       = "catalog-service-kafka-third-party-data-consume"
  owner     = "eng-nv-catalog-intelligence"
  repo      = "doordash/catalog-service"
  tier      = "1"
  topic     = "catalog-service__cdc_third_party_data"

  # kafka avalability SLO
  enable_availability_slo = true
  availability_objective  = 99.9

  ## Set objectives for latency/availability
  enable_latency_slo = true
  latency_objective  = 99.9
  # latency in milliseconds
  latency_bucket = "1024.0"

  # Enables 5m/1h/1d/7d alerts with default thresholds and Warning severity
  enable_all_burn_rate_alerts = true

  # kafka consumer lag SLO
  enable_consumer_lag_slo = true
  consumer_lag_objective  = 99.9
  consumer_lag_bucket     = "300.0"

  disable_missing_data_alert = true
  test_mode                  = false
}

module "ugp-consume_kafka_slo" {
  source    = "git::https://github.com/doordash/terraform-slos.git//kafka?ref=v4.42.0"
  bucket_id = chronosphere_bucket.nv_catalog_intelligence.id
  service   = "catalog-service"

  slo       = "catalog-service-ugp-data-consume"

  # kafka avalability SLO

  availability_objective  = 99.9

  enable_latency_slo = false
  latency_objective  = 99.9
  latency_bucket     = "1024.0"

  # Enables 5m/1h/1d/7d alerts with default thresholds and Warning severity
  enable_all_burn_rate_alerts = true

  # kafka consumer lag SLO
  enable_consumer_lag_slo = true
  consumer_lag_objective  = 99.9
  consumer_lag_bucket     = "300.0"

  disable_missing_data_alert = true
  test_mode                  = false
}

2eefa90853 CATINT-000 chore: remove ugp consumer latency slo
944fc5adee Migrate payment risk alert owner to Payment Fraud (#42668)

content.content:
diff --git a/new-verticals/catalog-intelligence/consumer_slos.tf b/new-verticals/catalog-intelligence/consumer_slos.tf
index 5326494400..726d470d02 100644
--- a/new-verticals/catalog-intelligence/consumer_slos.tf
+++ b/new-verticals/catalog-intelligence/consumer_slos.tf
@@ -131,34 +131,3 @@ module "third_party_data-consume_kafka_slo" {
   test_mode                  = false
 }
 
-module "ugp-consume_kafka_slo" {
-  source    = "git::https://github.com/doordash/terraform-slos.git//kafka?ref=v4.42.0"
-  bucket_id = chronosphere_bucket.nv_catalog_intelligence.id
-  service   = "catalog-service"
-  namespace = "catalog-service"
-  slo       = "catalog-service-ugp-data-consume"
-  owner     = "eng-nv-catalog-intelligence"
-  repo      = "doordash/catalog-service"
-  tier      = "1"
-  topic     = "catalog-service__cdc_unique_global_product"
-
-  # kafka avalability SLO
-  enable_availability_slo = true
-  availability_objective  = 99.9
-
-  ## Set objectives for latency/availability
-  enable_latency_slo = false
-  latency_objective  = 99.9
-  latency_bucket     = "1024.0"
-
-  # Enables 5m/1h/1d/7d alerts with default thresholds and Warning severity
-  enable_all_burn_rate_alerts = true
-
-  # kafka consumer lag SLO
-  enable_consumer_lag_slo = true
-  consumer_lag_objective  = 99.9
-  consumer_lag_bucket     = "300.0"
-
-  disable_missing_data_alert = true
-  test_mode                  = false
-}
\ No newline at end of file
